title: Josiah’s Reforms and the Book of the Law
summary: Josiah becomes king at 8 years old and seeks God from a young age. He purges Judah of idols and repairs the temple. During this, the Book of the Law is found. Josiah repents, and God delays judgment because of his humility.

faq.question: What major discovery happened during Josiah’s reign?
faq.answer: The Book of the Law was found in the temple.

faq.question: How did Josiah respond to the Law?
faq.answer: He tore his clothes in repentance and led the people in renewal.
